org.fujion.webjar

Class WebJarLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.webjar.WebJarLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<WebJar>, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    public class WebJarLocator
extends Object
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, Iterable<WebJar>
    Locates all web jars on the class path, merging their import maps into a single import map that will be uploaded to the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the merged import map for SystemJS.
